Email Marketing & Listbuilding Course Review:

"Great Course! Highly informative course with step by step explanation." -Anusha

You've heard about the importance of using email marketing in your business, but perhaps you haven't gotten started with email marketing yet?

You see a lot of different opinions about email marketing and listbuilding but aren't sure where to turn for authoritative advice about email marketing?

You want the massive leverage that email marketing provides, but just need someone to guide and mentor you, step-by-step?

Then this is the course for you!

In this course, you will discover the power of email marketing to dramatically increase sales for your business - for ANY business.

In this course, I walk you through how to use Aweber, (which I've used for 15 years and recommend) one of the most respected and established email listbuilding / autoresponder services, to:

  • Create an email list
  • Create an autoresponder series (email drip campaign)
  • Create a double opt-in subscriber process
  • Create a single opt-in subscriber process
  • Create a broadcast email (email blast)
  • Create an opt-in form for your website
  • Install your opt-in form on your website
  • Create an Aweber-hosted opt-in page (no website required)
  • Import an existing email list from another service
  • Import an existing list from an offline source. business cards, LinkedIn contacts, etc.


Bottom line, you will get a fantastic education in the world of email marketing - from a 15 year veteran of the email marketing world!

Be sure to watch the free preview lectures below to get an idea of the quality of this course.

Enroll today, risk-free, because you have a 30-day, no-questions-asked, money-back guarantee!
